title: I just got to S1
body: So i recently got promoted into silver 1 but im starting to realize that im getting less and less lp per win even though iv been on a really long win streak?

replies.body:
because you are at a point where your MMR is equalising. If you keep winning it should get better, but your LP gains usually slow down a bit after you promote.

Also you've lost 5 of your last 9. I wouldn't call that a win streak.

I understand you won like 6 in a row before that, but your LP gains are greatly effected by your most recent results

I made the post when I played the Irelia match, I lost 1/12 games and my LP gains kept dropping for some reason. Anyway thanks for the info about getting less LP once you promote, that's probably the reason I saw a drop in it. Always good learning new things :D
Maybe you're closely approaching the rank were you'll be 50/50 win rate.
